Derrick Carr

Hi! I'm Derrick Carr (but you probably already knew that much if you're here). I'm a writer and bit whisperer, based out of Oakland, California. If you're asking, "what is a bit whisperer other than a term you just made up?" you're asking the right questions. I work as a web developer at thoughtbot, translating ideas and solutions into code.

As far as writing, I'm a Senior Poetry Reader at Muzzle Magazine. I've had poems appear in Muzzle, The Adroit Journal, among others. I'm a 2016 alum of Kearny Street Workshop's Interdisciplianry Writer's Lab

When I'm not programming or writing, you can catch me dipping into comic books, inventive text novels, or video games. Basically, catch me wherever someone is trying to imagine a new world.

Contact

Wanna chat? You can email me . (If you figured out "bit whisperer" without prior context we should be friends. Please hit me up).

Wanna follow me somewhere? Follow the right link below to find me. I can't guarantee it won't be a ghost town...
